text:
https://www.schneier.com/blog/archives/2023/09/critical-vulnerability-in-libwebp-library.html
 For Edge, it's patched since September, 15. https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-relnote-stable-channel#version-1170204531-september-15-2023
 Idem for Google Chrome: https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2023/09/stable-channel-update-for-desktop_11.html
 You should update to the latest version for both browsers. There's at least 1 more security update since mid September.
